ja167:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja167:1.1_0: “Mendicant, you seek alms before you eat;
ja167:1.2_0: you wouldn’t seek alms after eating.
ja167:1.4_0: don’t let the time pass you by.
ja167:2.3_0: That’s why I seek alms before eating,
ja167:2.4_0: so that the time may not pass me by!”
ja167:3.1_0: they were born in a seventh direction.
